thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com
thread.title: Marla
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Marla

author: Marla
title: Marla
text: We have just become customers of NSC and we are very happy. We would have to change our daughter once a night and she woke up wet every morning, When I say wet, the sheets, blankets and mattress pads had to be changed and the mattress cover cleaned. Since using the supreme air briefs during the day and the supreme briefs in the evening we have had no accidents! The air brief does need to be monitored, as if it gets too wet it will dampen clothes or furniture if you do not want to use a rubber pant, we do not use a rubber pant and keep an eye out, have had no issues there either.
